name: Karthik B
title: AI & Data Science Student | Python Developer
headline: Hi — I'm Karthik.B
summary: B.Tech AI & DS student at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering | Python & Web Development enthusiast | 810+ coding problems solved | Google Cloud & Generative AI certified.
about: I'm a B.Tech student in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science with a strong foundation in Python, web development, and competitive coding. I've completed 810+ problems on Skillrack, 20+ on LeetCode, 50+ on CodeChef, and earned 2400+ Hackos on HackerRank. Currently holding a CGPA of 7.4 (up to 2nd sem). I'm passionate about building practical applications and exploring AI/ML technologies. I'm Google Cloud certified in Introduction to Generative AI and have completed multiple programming certifications.

projects.name: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Developed a console and GUI-based application to streamline restaurant operations including menu management, order processing, billing, and customer records. Integrated Tkinter for the graphical user interface and HTML for front-end structuring. Implemented features using object-oriented programming and file handling to ensure smooth data flow and user interaction. Top 50 Winner – Internal Smart India Hackathon (SIH).
projects.tech: Python, Tkinter, HTML, OOP, File Handling

projects.name: Smart Tourist Safety Monitoring & Incident Response System
projects.description: Developed an AI & geo-fencing–based safety monitoring system for tourists. Implemented real-time alerting, emergency response workflows, and blockchain-based digital ID. Secured a position among the Top 50 teams in the internal college-level Smart India Hackathon (SIH) selection round.
projects.tech: Python, Geo-Fencing APIs, Blockchain Concept, AI Models

learningProjects.name: Weather Forecast Application
learningProjects.description: Weather application with real-time data visualization, location-based forecasts, historical weather trends, and 5-day forecast. Built with open-source weather APIs.

learningProjects.name: Portfolio Website Generator
learningProjects.description: Automated portfolio website builder. Users input their information (resume, projects, experience) and instantly get a beautiful, personalized portfolio site.

learningProjects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
learningProjects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, experience, and skills. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Includes Chatbase AI integration.
learningProjects.tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Chatbase AI

education.degree: B.Tech - Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
